mng: to feel with the hand, to touch, to stroke, to grope, to steal, to abstract

exm.mng: to feel about, to grope about, to fumble, to do things slowly
to fathom, to make sense of, to grasp
to grope about in the dark
to gently caress and stroke, to pet, to fondle
unable to clearly understand (a situation etc)
to be unable to make any sense of the matter, to be at a loss
to go through arduous training or hard work
